formulas.name: funcS_PemilikSertifikat
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertifikat Atas Nama Orang Tua" || {!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertifikat Atas Nama Mertua" || {!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertipikat Atas Nama Beberapa Orang" || {!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertipikat Atas Nama Badan Usaha" || {!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertipikat Atas Nama Pengurus Badan Usaha", {!Get_Pemilik_Sertifikat.Name}, IF({!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertifikat Atas Nama Penjual" || {!Get_Loan_Information.Sertipikat_Atas_Nama__c} == "Sertifikat Atas Nama Developer" , {!Get_Pemilik_Sertifikat.Nama_Seller__c}, {!Get_Loan_Information.Account.Customer_Name_Formula__c}))

formulas.name: TodayDate
formulas.expression: TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())) & "-" & IF(LEN(TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))) = 1, "0" & TEXT(MONTH(TODAY())), TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))) & "-" & IF(LEN(TEXT(DAY(TODAY()))) = 1, "0" & TEXT(DAY(TODAY())), TEXT(DAY(TODAY())))
